docs.abstract: Martin Wickler article on difficulty in stopping smoking; cartoon
docs.lead_paragraph: BLOOMFIELD, N. J.--It took many years for me to realize that I do not live alone. "So what took you so long, idiot?" you will surely inquire. "You've got a wife, you've raised two kids, and now you're a grandfather. How could you possibly even imagine that you lived alone?"
